Declaration Note

Terms And Conditions
1.You might to travel to different part of India or Abroad as apart
or yourjob responsibility.
2.You will have to submit the medical fitness certificate on or
before the specified joined date.
3.You will entitled to avail leave only once a year.
4.You need to hand over the original degree/diploma
certificates as soon as you join to company.
5.You will have to work with our organization for minimum period of
3 years failing to do so ,you will have to compensate Rs.1 lakh towards 'on-the-job
trainee',business loss incurred and administrative expense.
6.In case of resignation you need to give us 3 months notice
 (Referred by)
